assignments.utilization_method: Hold the narrow end of the stand’s leg between thumb and fingers, allowing the broad base to act as the contacting surface

physical_object.name: clear 30 cm plastic ruler with metric markings

assignments.utilization_method: Hold one short end of the ruler between thumb and fingers like a handle, press the long flat edge onto the table, and glide it forward and back in controlled cutting strokes.

physical_object.name: small metal key with black plastic head

assignments.utilization_method: Hold the plastic head between thumb and index finger, point the metal blade forward, lower the blade toward the surface with a wrist dip, lift and tilt the blade slightly while moving the hand toward the mouth area.

physical_object.name: small wooden handheld broom with black bristles

assignments.utilization_method: Place the broom on the table with the bristles facing upward. Lower the ruler’s far tip into the dense bristle field and rotate the wrist in compact circles, keeping the tip nestled among the bristles.

physical_object.name: pack of green and white facial tissues with one tissue pulled out

assignments.utilization_method: Place the unopened side of the tissue pack flat on the table so the soft plastic film and stacked tissues face upward. Stab the ruler edge straight down into the pack, sinking through the flexible film into the compressible tissue layers.
Enclose the mouse in one hand, flip the flat face toward the floor, and shake the wrist repeatedly
